mapper.select: SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, FAC_GUBUN_CODE AS facGubunCode, FAC_CODE AS facCode, OPER_ENABLE AS operEnable, HIRE_FAC_ENABLE AS hireFacEnable, INSTALL_ARTICLE_GUBUN AS installArticleGubun, ASSET_SEQ_NO AS assetSeqNo, FAC_IP_ADDR AS facIpAddr, FAC_GW_ADDR AS facGwAddr, FAC_SMASK_ADDR AS facSmaskAddr, HIRE_FEE AS hireFee, DETAIL_FAC_INFO AS detailFacInfo, ADOPT_DATE AS adoptDate, INSTALL_DATE AS installDate FROM ATMS_FACILITY_STATUS

SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, FAC_GUBUN_CODE AS facGubunCode, FAC_CODE AS facCode, OPER_ENABLE AS operEnable, HIRE_FAC_ENABLE AS hireFacEnable, INSTALL_ARTICLE_GUBUN AS installArticleGubun, ASSET_SEQ_NO AS assetSeqNo, FAC_IP_ADDR AS facIpAddr, FAC_GW_ADDR AS facGwAddr, FAC_SMASK_ADDR AS facSmaskAddr, HIRE_FEE AS hireFee, DETAIL_FAC_INFO AS detailFacInfo, ADOPT_DATE AS adoptDate, INSTALL_DATE AS installDate FROM ATMS_FACILITY_STATUS WHERE JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_FACILITY_STATUS WHERE JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}

UPDATE ATMS_FACILITY_STATUS SET BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, FAC_GUBUN_CODE = #{facGubunCode}, FAC_CODE = #{facCode}, OPER_ENABLE = #{operEnable}, HIRE_FAC_ENABLE = #{hireFacEnable}, INSTALL_ARTICLE_GUBUN = #{installArticleGubun}, ASSET_SEQ_NO = #{assetSeqNo}, FAC_IP_ADDR = #{facIpAddr}, FAC_GW_ADDR = #{facGwAddr}, FAC_SMASK_ADDR = #{facSmaskAddr}, HIRE_FEE = #{hireFee}, DETAIL_FAC_INFO = #{detailFacInfo}, ADOPT_DATE = #{adoptDate}, INSTALL_DATE = #{installDate} WHERE JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}

INSERT INTO ATMS_FACILITY_STATUS ( JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, BRANCH_NAME, CORNER_CODE, CORNER_NAME, FAC_GUBUN_CODE, FAC_CODE, OPER_ENABLE, HIRE_FAC_ENABLE, INSTALL_ARTICLE_GUBUN, ASSET_SEQ_NO, FAC_IP_ADDR, FAC_GW_ADDR, FAC_SMASK_ADDR, HIRE_FEE, DETAIL_FAC_INFO, ADOPT_DATE, INSTALL_DATE ) VALUES ( #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{branchName}, #{cornerCode}, #{cornerName}, #{facGubunCode}, #{facCode}, #{operEnable}, #{hireFacEnable}, #{installArticleGubun}, #{assetSeqNo}, #{facIpAddr}, #{facGwAddr}, #{facSmaskAddr}, #{hireFee}, #{detailFacInfo}, #{adoptDate}, #{installDate} )
